","diff --git a/cards/plugin.md b/cards/plugin.md new file mode 100644 index 0000000..f6a7407 --- /dev/null +++ b/cards/plugin.md @@ -0,0 +1,3 @@ +# {{ name }} + +This is test plugin card ","diff --git a/tests/test_document.py b/tests/test_document.py index 7883e83..852d517 100644 --- a/tests/test_document.py +++ b/tests/test_document.py @@ -20,8 +20,7 @@ def test_document_format(): def test_document_project(): project = Project(config="livemark.yaml") - document = Document("index.md") - document.project = project + document = Document("index.md", project=project) assert document.source == "index.md" assert document.project is project @@ -77,8 +76,7 @@ def test_document_build_print(): def test_document_read(): project = Project(config="livemark.yaml") - document = Document("index.md") - document.project = project + document = Document("index.md", project=project) document.read() assert document.source == "index.md" assert document.target == "index.html" ","diff --git a/tests/test_project.py b/tests/test_project.py index 7839778..6fe9ad7 100644 --- a/tests/test_project.py +++ b/tests/test_project.py @@ -5,5 +5,14 @@ from livemark import Project def test_project(): + project = Project(source="index.md") + assert project.document.source == "index.md" + + +# Read + + +def test_project_read(): project = Project(config="livemark.yaml") + project.read() assert project.config["brand"]["text"] == "Livemark""]
